channel.title: Players get killed and sit on ground for like a minute? PI 317!
channel.description:
For some reason when I kill a player, he'll get on the ground (like the dying emote) but pause once fully on the ground and won't respawn back at home for a while, and I don't know whyyy... any suggestions!? D:
EDIT: won't respawn back at home AT ALL, and only happens occasionally.
